ai-patthana21.38:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.38:0.3_0: for the sake of self-defilement, etc., that for the sake of clinging, and so on,
ai-patthana21.38:1.1_0: Not for the sake of establishing, not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of function, and for the sake of offering condition.
ai-patthana21.38:2.1_0: Not for the sake of establishing, not for the sake of non-existence, nor for the sake of function, and for the sake of offering beauty.
ai-patthana21.38:2.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.38:2.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.38:3.1_0: don’t have the reason for the sake of sustained thought ...
ai-patthana21.38:3.1_1: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.38:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.38:4.1_0: Not for the sake of establishing, not for the sake of function, and for the sake of non-existence, this is the cause.
ai-patthana21.38:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.38:5.1_0: (They are) not connected with the roots of legal procedures, nor with no attachments,
ai-patthana21.38:5.1_2: And they don’t even a question with cause or reason.
